procedure.step1: Cut off the hard ends of a whole orange, including the peel, and chop it into chunks; extract only the pulp from the second orange. Blend everything in the blender until smooth.
procedure.step2: Beat the eggs with the sugar until the mixture is light and frothy.
procedure.step3: Add the egg mixture to the orange puree, then add oil and water, and mix at low speed.
procedure.step4: Add the flour and baking powder to the mixture until you get a fairly liquid, but homogeneous batter.
procedure.step5: Grease and flour a 22 cm diameter cake pan and pour in the batter.
procedure.step6: Bake in a preheated static oven at 170Â°C for 35 minutes, then switch to convection mode for another 10 minutes. Do the toothpick test in the center before removing from the oven.
procedure.step7: Let the cake cool and decorate with powdered sugar.
